biblStruct.note: "Now the Paris manuscript B. N. Arabe 6725 folio 2 and the London manuscript B. L. Or 6714 folio 1-73 present a collection of his [Mar Subhalmaran] writings on spiritual life, regulations for monastic living, and homiletic exegesis; but the concern of the present study is only with the Paris folio 2 and the London folios 1-30. Here there are fifteen chapters concerning the divine gifts, or virtues, whose foundation and crown is love-the love which the Christian has for the Father. [...] The present article is to give some description of the work, "ktb' dmnwt" ["Liber partium"], and to convey its flavour with reference to its content and the author's method." (p. 175)
